description: This schema represents the arousal score and valence score used to calculate photographic affect meter (PAM).

references.description: Pollak, J.P., Adams, P., Gay, G. (2011) PAM: a photographic affect meter for frequent, in situ measurement of affect. in the Proceedings of the ACM Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems (CHI 2011) Vancouver, BC, Canada, May 5-12, pp. 725-734.
